resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: User-defined JDBC Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Custom JDBC2.0-compliant Provider configuration

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 Universal JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Non-XA DB2 Universal JDBC Driver-compliant Provider. Datasources created under this provider support only 1-phase commit processing except in the case where driver type 2 is used under WAS z/OS. On WAS z/OS, driver type 2 uses RRS and supports 2-phase commit processing

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 Universal JDBC Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: XA DB2 Universal JDBC Driver-compliant Provider. Datasources created under this provider support the use of XA to perform 2-phase commit processing. Use of driver type 2 on WAS z/OS is not supported for datasources created under this provider.

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 Legacy CLI-based Type 2 JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: DB2 Legacy CLI-based Type 2 JDBC Driver
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - DB2 JDBC2-compliant Provider

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 Legacy CLI-based Type 2 JDBC Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: DB2 Legacy CLI-based Type 2 JDBC Driver (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - DB2 JDBC2-compliant Provider

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 UDB for iSeries Provider Only (Native)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: IBM Developer Kit for Java JDBC Driver for local DB2 connections on iSeries. This driver is not recommended for remote access. The jar file for this driver is /QIBM/ProdData/Java400/ext/db2_classes.jar

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 UDB for iSeries Provider Only (Native XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: IBM Developer Kit for Java XA-compliant JDBC Driver for local DB2 connections on iSeries. This driver is not recommended for remote access. The jar file for this driver is /QIBM/ProdData/Java400/ext/db2_classes.jar

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 UDB for iSeries Provider Only (Toolbox)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: IBM Toolbox for Java JDBC Driver for remote DB2 connections on iSeries. This driver is recommended over the IBM Developer Kit for Java JDBC Driver for access to remote DB2 UDB for iSeries. The jar file for this driver is /QIBM/ProdData/Http/Public/jt400/lib/jt400.jar

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 UDB for iSeries Provider Only (Toolbox XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: XA-compliant IBM Toolbox for Java JDBC Driver for remote DB2 connections on iSeries. This driver is recommended over the IBM Developer Kit for Java JDBC Driver for remote connections on iSeries, and provides JTA support. The jar file for this driver is /QIBM/ProdData/Http/Public/jt400/lib/jt400.jar

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DB2 for zOS Local JDBC Provider Only (RRS)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: DB2 for zOS Local JDBC Provider (RRS)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - DB2 for z/OS Local JDBC2-compliant Provider

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Cloudscape JDBC Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - Cloudscape 51 embedded JDBC2-compliant Provider. This provider has been deprecated and is only configurable in version 6.0.2.x and earlier nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Cloudscape JDBC Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - Cloudscape 51 embedded JDBC2-compliant Provider. This provider has been deprecated and is only configurable in version 6.0.2.x and earlier nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Cloudscape Network Server Using Universal JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: Cloudscape Network Server Using Universal JDBC Driver
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer null - maxVer 6.0.2 - Cloudscape NetworkServer Provider using db2 universal driver. This provider has been deprecated and is only configurable in version 6.0.2.x and earlier nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Informix JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Informix JDBC Driver

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Informix JDBC Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Informix JDBC Driver for JTA/XA (two-phase commit)

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Sybase JDBC 2 Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Sybase JDBC 2 Driver

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Sybase JDBC 2 Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Sybase JDBC 2 Driver for two-phase commit (JTA/XA)

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Sybase JDBC 3 Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.1 - maxVer null - Sybase JDBC 3 Driver. This provider is only configurable in version 6.1 and later nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Sybase JDBC 3 Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.1 - maxVer null - Sybase JDBC 3 Driver for two-phase commit (JTA/XA). This provider is only configurable in version 6.1 and later nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Oracle JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Oracle JDBC Driver

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Oracle JDBC Driver Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Oracle JDBC Driver (XA)

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server.

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: DataDirect ConnectJDBC type 4 driver for MS SQL Server(XA).

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server.

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: WebSphere embedded ConnectJDBC driver for MS SQL Server(XA).

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Derby JDBC Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.0.2 - maxVer null - Derby embedded non-XA JDBC Provider. This provider is only configurable in version 6.0.2 and later nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Derby JDBC Provider Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.0.2 - maxVer null - Derby embedded XA JDBC Provider. This provider is only configurable in version 6.0.2 and later nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Derby Network Server Using Universal JDBC Driver Provider Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: Derby Network Server Using Universal JDBC Driver
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: Deprecated - minVer 6.0.2 - maxVer 6.0.2 - Derby Network Server Provider using DB2 universal driver. This provider has been deprecated and should only be used in version 6.0.2 nodes. Use the JDBC provider with the provider type, "Derby Network Server using Derby Client Only".

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Derby Network Server Using Derby Client Only
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: Derby Network Server Using Derby Client
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.1 - maxVer null - Derby Network Server Provider that uses the Derby Client. This provider is only configurable in version 6.1 and later nodes

resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.name: Derby Network Server Using Derby Client Only (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.providerType: Derby Network Server Using Derby Client (XA)
resources.jdbc:JDBCProvider.description: minVer 6.1 - maxVer null - Derby Network Server (XA) Provider that uses the Derby Client. This provider is only configurable in version 6.1 and later nodes
